factory_reset.label: Reset Parameters to Factory Defaults
factory_reset.description: If the value changes to 2 after resetting the parameters, some non-default parameters were reset to their respective default values.

autoexclude.label: Autoexclude
autoexclude.description: Can be used to exclude the device in hard-to-reach locations.

calibration.label: Calibration
calibration.description: To calibrate, first select Discalibrated, then Calibrated
